summary: An individual's initial fear of engaging in a new activity due to potential risks can be overcome through education, support, and encouragement from others.
A sedentary lifestyle can negatively affect both physical and mental health, prompting individuals to seek change for overall improvement.
Observing the positive experiences and outcomes of peers can inspire an individual to adopt similar beneficial habits.
Having access to knowledgeable guidance and support can alleviate fears and build confidence in undertaking new challenges.
